item.title: Scatter Plot in Rstudio
item.description: In this class we will learn how to create a scatter plot with the Lahman database, using dplyr, and using ggplot2, with ggiraph to make it interactive. First letâ€™s load some packages: library(Lahman) library(dplyr) library(ggplot2) library(ggiraph) Using dplyr, we want to get all the players with 400 or more HR in their careers, and the total amount of SO in their careers. df<-Batting%>% group_by(playerID)%>% summarize(career_HR=sum(HR), career_SO=sum(SO))%>% filter(career_HR>=400 ) df ## # A tibble: 55 x 3 ## playerID career_HR career_SO ## <chr> <int> <int> ## 1 aaronha01 755 1383 ## 2 bagweje01 449 1558 ## 3 bankser01 512 1236 ## 4 beltrad01 445 1584 ## 5 beltrca01 421 1693 ## 6 bondsba01 762 1539 ## 7 cabremi01 446 1516 ## 8 cansejo01 462 1942 ## 9 dawsoan01 438 1509 ## 10 delgaca01 473 1745 ## # .
